text: The Ambassador of Malaysia to the Republic of Chile is the head of Malaysia's diplomatic mission to Chile. The position has the rank and status of an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary and is based in the Embassy of Malaysia, Santiago. ==List of heads of mission== ===Chargés d'Affaires to Chile=== {| class=wikitable ! Chargé d'AffairesHistory – Embassy of Malaysia, Santiago ! Term start ! Term end |- | Iskandar Sarudin || 2 December 1991 || |} ===Ambassadors to Chile=== {| class=wikitable ! AmbassadorHistory – Embassy of Malaysia, Santiago ! Term start ! Term end |- | Dennis J. Ignatius || 26 March 1992 || |- | Lily Zachariah || 18 December 1996 || |- | Arumugam Ganapathy || 29 August 2000 || |- | Abdullah Faiz Zain || 13 February 2006 || |- | Ganeson Sivagurunathan || 12 September 2011 || |- | Mohamad Rameez Yahaya || 4 October 2015 || 2018 |} ==See also== * Chile–Malaysia relations == References == Chile Malaysia
title: List of ambassadors of Malaysia to Chile
